You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &itilde;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Itilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0128/index.htm U+00128].
  * `&itilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0129/index.htm U+00129].
